Code & Cook Afternoon

Small Business Web Developer Community Service Project

This is...A lot of the time our small business donate catered meals or services to our hard working volunteers! Don't miss this fun giving event!

Weekly Schedule

Competitions

Want to compete in a hackathon? Want to form or join a local team? Ask our coordinators to be added to our Facebook group message to connect with other coders in our community!

Buddy Program

We hold a mentorship program to pair willing mentors with willing newbies. Ask our coordinators for more information!

Job Board

When one of our community member's has a job opportunity, we post it our instagram. Don't forget to follow us!

Merch!

Sport our merch to support our community events and the continuation of The Coders Collective!
